5284_greeting.text: {if:first_meeting}Welcome to The Velvet Veil! I'm Elena Schmidt. {else}Good to see you again! {endif}Would you like a drink, or perhaps you'd like to hear about our specials?

options.text: Tell me about your tavern
What's on the menu today?
How did you come to run this place?

5284_background.text: The Velvet Veil is more than just a tavern - it's a gathering place for the community. We pride ourselves on treating everyone with respect, whether they're a noble or a common worker. Our prices are fair, and our atmosphere is welcoming to all.

options.text: That's a noble approach to running a business
How do you maintain order with such diverse clientele?
Just give me a drink

5284_philosophy.text: Thank you. I believe a tavern should be a place where people can come together, share stories, and feel at home. My father taught me that respect and fairness are the foundation of good business. I try to honor that legacy every day.

options.text: Your father would be proud of what you've built
Tell me more about your father's teachings
I should order something

5284_trust.text: That means a lot to hear. I've worked hard to maintain the standards he set while also putting my own mark on the place. The Velvet Veil has become a second home for many in the community, and that's something I'm very proud of.

options.text: Do you have any plans for the future?
I'll have a drink now

5284_dreams.text: I'd love to expand the tavern while keeping its welcoming atmosphere. Maybe add a performance space for local musicians or a private room for important meetings. But any changes would have to maintain the spirit of the place - a home away from home for all.

options.text: That sounds like a wonderful vision
Let's talk about that over a drink

5284_management.text: It's all about setting clear expectations and treating everyone fairly. I have a few simple rules: respect the staff, respect other patrons, and keep disagreements civil. Most people appreciate having a place where they know they'll be treated well.

options.text: That's a wise approach
What happens when someone breaks the rules?

5284_caution.text: Thank you. It's not always easy, especially being young and running a place like this. But I've learned that consistency and fairness go a long way. People respect that, even if they don't always agree with every decision.

options.text: You've handled the challenge well
Let's get back to the menu

5284_rules.text: First, a warning. If that doesn't work, they're asked to leave. I've only had to ban a handful of people in all my years here. Most understand when they've crossed a line and apologize. The regulars actually help maintain the atmosphere too - they know what kind of place this is.

options.text: That's impressive for someone your age
Let's talk about something more pleasant

5284_menu.text: Today we have our house ale, a fine selection of wines, and some special mead that just came in. Our kitchen is serving fresh bread, cheese, and a hearty stew. What would you like?

options.text: I'll have the house ale (5) [Purchase]
The special mead sounds interesting (8) [Purchase]
Just the stew, please (10) [Purchase]

5284_serve.text: Coming right up! Let me know if you need anything else. We're always happy to help our patrons.

options.text: Thank you, I'll enjoy this

5284_story.text: I took over The Velvet Veil when I was quite young, after my father fell ill. It was challenging at first - some people doubted a young woman could run a tavern. But I learned quickly, and the regulars were very supportive. They helped me find my footing.

options.text: That's quite an achievement
What was the hardest part?
Let's get back to the menu

5284_challenges.text: Proving myself, definitely. Some customers tried to take advantage of my inexperience at first. But I learned to stand my ground while staying polite. The regulars saw I was serious about maintaining the tavern's standards, and they started supporting me more openly.

options.text: You've clearly succeeded
I should try your house ale

5284_greeting_return.text: Welcome back! I was just checking our new shipment of mead. Would you like to try some, or perhaps you'd prefer to hear about our other offerings?

options.text: Tell me about the new mead
How are your expansion plans coming along?
I'll have my usual

5284_progress.text: I've been saving up and making some plans. The regulars have been very supportive of the idea of expansion. I'm thinking of starting with a small performance space - we have some talented musicians in the area who could use a proper venue.

options.text: That sounds like a great first step
Let's celebrate with a drink
